data.eml:eml: The lanternfly genus Penthicodes: key to the species and review of the “ Ereosoma group ” with two new species and one new subspecies (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Fulgoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constant, Jerome (2010): The lanternfly genus Penthicodes: key to the species and review of the “ Ereosoma group ” with two new species and one new subspecies (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Fulgoridae). Zootaxa 2523: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196336
